trans-unit.source: An in-memory representation of an XML Schema, as specified in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML Schema Part 1: Structures](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/) and [XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/) specifications.
trans-unit.target: XML 架构的内存内表示形式，它按照万维网联合会 (W3C) [XML 架构第 1 部分：“结构”](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/)及[第 2 部分：“数据类型规范”](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)进行指定。

trans-unit.source: Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用来自未知或不受信任的源或位置的架构。

trans-unit.source: Doing so will compromise the security of your code.
trans-unit.target: 这样会危及你的代码的安全性。

trans-unit.source: XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: XML 架构 （包括内联架构） 的本质上就容易受到拒绝服务攻击;不要在不受信任的情况下接受它们。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions raised as a result of using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> class, such as the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> class, may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 由于使用而引发的异常<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>类，如<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException>类中，可能包含不应在不受信任的方案中公开的敏感信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A>属性<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException>返回导致异常的架构文件的 URI 路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A> property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A>不应在不受信任的方案中公开属性。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions should be properly handled so this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 应正确处理异常，因此在不受信任的情况下不公开此敏感信息。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a schema definition.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建架构定义。

trans-unit.source: The following XML file is generated for the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 为前面的代码示例生成下面的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the form for attributes declared in the target namespace of the schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在架构的目标命名空间中声明的属性的窗体。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm" /> value that indicates if attributes from the target namespace are required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm" /> 值，它表明来自目标命名空间的特性是否需要用命名空间前缀限定。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm.None" />。

trans-unit.source: The value must be one of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm> values shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 值必须是<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm>下表中所示的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm> Value
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm> 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The attribute form is not specified in schema.
trans-unit.target: 架构中未指定属性窗体。

trans-unit.source: Attributes from the target namespace must be qualified with the namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 必须用命名空间前缀限定的目标命名空间中的属性。

trans-unit.source: Attributes from the target namespace are not required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 中的目标命名空间的属性不需要用命名空间前缀限定。

trans-unit.source: This value is the global default for all attributes declared in the target namespace.
trans-unit.target: 对于在目标命名空间中声明的所有属性，该值是全局默认值。

trans-unit.source: Individual attributes can override this setting for the local scope using the `form` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 单独的属性可以重写本地作用域使用此设置`form`属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the post-schema-compilation value of all the global attribute groups in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取架构中所有全局属性组的架构编译后值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable" /> collection of all the global attribute groups in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 架构中所有全局特性组的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the post-schema-compilation value for all the attributes in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取架构中所有属性的架构编译后值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable" /> collection of all the attributes in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 架构中所有特性的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="blockDefault" /> attribute which sets the default value of the <see langword="block" /> attribute on element and complex types in the <see langword="targetNamespace" /> of the schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see langword="blockDefault" /> 特性，该特性设置 <see langword="block" /> 架构中的元素和复杂类型的 <see langword="targetNamespace" /> 特性的默认值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod" /> value representing the different methods for preventing derivation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod" /> 值，它表示阻止派生的不同方法。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="XmlSchemaDerivationMethod.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="XmlSchemaDerivationMethod.None" />。

trans-unit.source: The `block` attribute prevents a `complexType` or element that has the specified type of derivation from being used in place of the inherited `complexType` or element.
trans-unit.target: `block`属性防止`complexType`或已从正在使用的继承就地派生的指定的类型的元素`complexType`或元素。

trans-unit.source: This attribute's value can either be a white space separated list of restriction, extension and substitution or the value can contain `#all` or a list that is a subset of extension, restriction, or substitution.
trans-unit.target: 此特性的值可以是空格分隔列表的限制、 扩展和替换，也可以包含的值`#all`或列表，为扩展、 限制或替换的子集。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值的<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>。

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: By default, there are no restrictions on type derivations in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，没有限制的架构中的类型派生。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the default derivation method and allows any type derivations in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 重写默认派生方法，并允许在架构中的任何类型的派生。

trans-unit.source: By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Extension.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能是通过扩展而派生。

trans-unit.source: Applies only to element and complex type elements.
trans-unit.target: 仅适用于元素和复杂类型元素。

trans-unit.source: By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Restriction.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不能通过限制派生此架构中的元素。

trans-unit.source: By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Union.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不能由联合派生此架构中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Applies only to simple types.
trans-unit.target: 仅适用于简单类型。

trans-unit.source: By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by List.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能派生的列表。

trans-unit.source: Applies only to simple types.
trans-unit.target: 仅适用于简单类型。

trans-unit.source: `#all`.
trans-unit.target: `#all`。

trans-unit.source: By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by any method.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该架构中的元素不能通过任何方法派生。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the XML Schema Object Model (SOM) into schema information for validation.
trans-unit.target: 将 XML 架构对象模型 (SOM) 编译为架构信息供验证使用。

trans-unit.source: Used to check the syntactic and semantic structure of the programmatically built SOM.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查以编程方式生成的 SOM 的语法和语义结构。

trans-unit.source: Semantic validation checking is performed during compilation.
trans-unit.target: 语义验证检查在编译期间执行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Compile%2A> method is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Compile%2A>方法已过时 Microsoft.NET Framework 2.0 版中，已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The validation event handler that receives information about XML Schema validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 验证事件处理程序，它接收 XML 架构验证错误的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the XML Schema Object Model (SOM) into schema information for validation.
trans-unit.target: 将 XML 架构对象模型 (SOM) 编译为架构信息供验证使用。

trans-unit.source: Used to check the syntactic and semantic structure of the programmatically built SOM.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查以编程方式生成的 SOM 的语法和语义结构。

trans-unit.source: Semantic validation checking is performed during compilation.
trans-unit.target: 语义验证检查在编译期间执行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Compile%2A> method is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Compile%2A>方法已过时 Microsoft.NET Framework 2.0 版中，已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The validation event handler that receives information about the XML Schema validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 验证事件处理程序，它接收有关 XML 架构验证错误的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlResolver" /> used to resolve namespaces referenced in <see langword="include" /> and <see langword="import" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 用于解析 <see langword="include" /> 和 <see langword="import" /> 元素中引用的命名空间的 <see langword="XmlResolver" />。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the XML Schema Object Model (SOM) into schema information for validation.
trans-unit.target: 将 XML 架构对象模型 (SOM) 编译为架构信息供验证使用。

trans-unit.source: Used to check the syntactic and semantic structure of the programmatically built SOM.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查以编程方式生成的 SOM 的语法和语义结构。

trans-unit.source: Semantic validation checking is performed during compilation.
trans-unit.target: 语义验证检查在编译期间执行。

trans-unit.source: If the SOM references other namespaces through the `import` or `include` elements, the `XmlResolver` is used to resolve these references.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SOM 引用通过其他命名空间`import`或`include`元素，`XmlResolver`用于解析这些引用。

trans-unit.source: If the resolver is set to `null`, this indicates that the user does not care about resolving `import` or `include` elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果冲突解决程序设置为`null`，这表示，用户并不关心解决`import`或`include`元素。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the references are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，未解析引用。

trans-unit.source: The resolver is not cached after the `Compile` method completes.
trans-unit.target: 后不缓存解析程序`Compile`方法完成。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Compile%2A> method is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Compile%2A>方法已过时 Microsoft.NET Framework 2.0 版中，已被取代<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Compile%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> class to resolve external schemas referenced in include, import, or redefine elements by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Compile%2A>方法使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>类来解析外部架构中引用包含、 导入，或默认情况下重新定义元素。

trans-unit.source: You can disable resolution of external schemas by passing null as the <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过传递作为 null 来禁用解析外部架构<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the form for elements declared in the target namespace of the schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在架构的目标命名空间中声明的元素的窗体。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm" /> value that indicates if elements from the target namespace are required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm" /> 值，它表明来自目标命名空间的元素是否需要用命名空间前缀限定。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm.None" />。

trans-unit.source: The value must be one of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm> values shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 值必须是<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm>下表中所示的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm> Value
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm> 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The element form is not specified in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 架构中未指定元素窗体。

trans-unit.source: Elements from the target namespace must be qualified with the namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 必须用命名空间前缀限定的目标命名空间中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Elements from the target namespace are not required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 目标命名空间的元素不需要用命名空间前缀限定。

trans-unit.source: This value is the global default for all elements declared in the target namespace.
trans-unit.target: 对于在目标命名空间中声明的所有元素，该值是全局默认值。

trans-unit.source: Individual elements can override this setting for the local scope by using the `form` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 各个元素可以使用覆盖此设置为局部范围`form`属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the post-schema-compilation value for all the elements in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取架构中所有元素的架构编译后值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable" /> collection of all the elements in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 架构中所有元素的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="finalDefault" /> attribute which sets the default value of the <see langword="final" /> attribute on elements and complex types in the target namespace of the schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see langword="finalDefault" /> 特性，该特性设置架构目标命名空间中的元素和复杂类型的 <see langword="final" /> 特性的默认值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod" /> value representing the different methods for preventing derivation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod" /> 值，它表示阻止派生的不同方法。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="XmlSchemaDerivationMethod.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="XmlSchemaDerivationMethod.None" />。

trans-unit.source: The `final` attribute prevents the specified type of derivation of an element or complex type.
trans-unit.target: `final`特性防止派生类型元素的指定的类型或复杂类型。

trans-unit.source: This value can contain `#all` or a list that is a subset of extension or restriction.
trans-unit.target: 此值可以包含`#all`或列表，是扩展或限制的子集。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值的<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>。

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: By default, there are no restrictions on type derivations in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，没有限制的架构中的类型派生。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the default derivation method and allows any type derivations in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 重写默认派生方法，并允许在架构中的任何类型的派生。

trans-unit.source: By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Extension.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能是通过扩展而派生。

trans-unit.source: Applies only to element and complex type elements.
trans-unit.target: 仅适用于元素和复杂类型元素。

trans-unit.source: By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Restriction.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不能通过限制派生此架构中的元素。

trans-unit.source: By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Union.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不能由联合派生此架构中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Applies only to simple types.
trans-unit.target: 仅适用于简单类型。

trans-unit.source: By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by List.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能派生的列表。

trans-unit.source: Applies only to simple types.
trans-unit.target: 仅适用于简单类型。

trans-unit.source: `#all`.
trans-unit.target: `#all`。

trans-unit.source: By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by any method.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该架构中的元素不能通过任何方法派生。

trans-unit.source: Gets the post-schema-compilation value of all the groups in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取架构中所有组的架构编译后值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable" /> collection of all the groups in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 架构中所有组的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string ID.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置字符串 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the string.
trans-unit.target: 字符串的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of included and imported schemas.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含的和导入的架构的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectCollection" /> of the included and imported schemas.
trans-unit.target: 包含的和导入的架构的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectCollection.Add%2A> method expects only <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaExternal> and its derived types (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaImport>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInclude>, and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaRedefine>) as parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法应只<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaExternal>及其派生类型 (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaImport>， <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInclude>，和<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaRedefine>) 作为参数。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates adding an included schema to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Includes%2A> collection of an existing <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示添加一个包含的架构写入<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Includes%2A>的现有集合<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>对象。

trans-unit.source: The XML schema instance namespace.
trans-unit.target: XML 架构实例命名空间。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the schema has been compiled.
trans-unit.target: 表明架构是否已编译。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if schema has been compiled, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已编译，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of schema elements in the schema and is used to add new element types at the <see langword="schema" /> element level.
trans-unit.target: 获取架构中架构元素的集合，并在 <see langword="schema" /> 元素级别用于添加新的元素类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectCollection" /> of schema elements in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 架构中架构元素的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnnotation>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttributeGroup>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroup>, or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaNotation>.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnnotation>， <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>， <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttributeGroup>， <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>， <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType>， <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>， <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroup>，或<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaNotation>。

trans-unit.source: The XML schema namespace.
trans-unit.target: XML 架构命名空间。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the post-schema-compilation value for all notations in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取架构中所有注释的架构编译后值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable" /> collection of all notations in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 架构中所有表示法的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Reads an XML Schema.
trans-unit.target: 读取 XML 架构。

trans-unit.source: The supplied data stream.
trans-unit.target: 提供的数据流。

trans-unit.source: The validation event handler that receives information about XML Schema syntax errors.
trans-unit.target: 验证事件处理程序，它接收 XML 架构语法错误的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: Reads an XML Schema from the supplied stream.
trans-unit.target: 从提供的流中读取 XML 架构。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object representing the XML Schema.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 架构的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> is raised if no <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> is specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" />，则引发 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="TextReader" /> containing the XML Schema to read.
trans-unit.target: 包含要读取的 XML 架构的 <see langword="TextReader" />。

trans-unit.source: The validation event handler that receives information about the XML Schema syntax errors.
trans-unit.target: 验证事件处理程序，它接收 XML 架构语法错误的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: Reads an XML Schema from the supplied <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 从提供的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 读取 XML 架构。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object representing the XML Schema.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 架构的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> is raised if no <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> is specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" />，则引发 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlReader" /> containing the XML Schema to read.
trans-unit.target: 包含要读取的 XML 架构的 <see langword="XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: The validation event handler that receives information about the XML Schema syntax errors.
trans-unit.target: 验证事件处理程序，它接收 XML 架构语法错误的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: Reads an XML Schema from the supplied <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 从提供的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 读取 XML 架构。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object representing the XML Schema.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 架构的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> is raised if no <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> is specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" />，则引发 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the post-schema-compilation value of all schema types in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取架构中所有架构类型的架构编译后值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectCollection" /> of all schema types in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 架构中所有架构类型的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the schema target namespace.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置架构目标命名空间的统一资源标识符 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: The schema target namespace.
trans-unit.target: 架构目标命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.TargetNamespace%2A> is the namespace of all schema components in this schema as well as any schema included using the `include` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.TargetNamespace%2A>的此架构中的所有架构组件，以及包含使用任何架构命名空间`include`元素。

trans-unit.source: Included schemas must either have the same target namespace as the containing schema or have no target namespace specified.
trans-unit.target: 包括的架构必须让包含的架构相同的目标命名空间，或指定没有目标命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the qualified attributes which do not belong to the schema target namespace.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置不属于架构目标命名空间的限定属性。

trans-unit.source: An array of qualified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> objects that do not belong to the schema target namespace.
trans-unit.target: 不属于架构目标命名空间的限定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of the schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置架构的版本。

trans-unit.source: The version of the schema.
trans-unit.target: 架构的版本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes out an XML Schema.
trans-unit.target: 写出 XML 架构。

trans-unit.source: The supplied data stream.
trans-unit.target: 提供的数据流。

trans-unit.source: Writes the XML Schema to the supplied data stream.
trans-unit.target: 将 XML 架构写入提供的数据流中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其中进行写入的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the XML Schema to the supplied <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将“XML 架构”写入提供的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其中进行写入的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the XML Schema to the supplied <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将“XML 架构”写入提供的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="writer" /> parameter is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writer" /> 参数为 null。

trans-unit.source: The supplied data stream.
trans-unit.target: 提供的数据流。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the XML Schema to the supplied <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> using the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 将“XML 架构”写入提供的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Supplying an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> disables automatic namespace prefix mapping.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>禁用自动命名空间前缀映射。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其中进行写入的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the XML Schema to the supplied <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将“XML 架构”写入提供的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Supplying an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> disables automatic namespace prefix mapping.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>禁用自动命名空间前缀映射。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其中进行写入的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the XML Schema to the supplied <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将“XML 架构”写入提供的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Supplying an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> disables automatic namespace prefix mapping.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>禁用自动命名空间前缀映射。
